titles.title: 350 Be All At Rest (takes work but then grabs & ho

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be all at rest
My soul oh blessed secret
Of the true life
That glorifies thy Lord
Not always doth
The busiest soul
Best serve Him
But he who resteth
On His faithful word

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Be all at rest
For rest is highest service
To the still heart
God doth his secrets tell
Thus shall thou learn
To wait and watch and labor
Strengthened to bear
Since Christ in thee doth dwell

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Be all at rest
For rest alone becometh
The soul that casts on Him
Its every care
Be all at rest
So shall thy life proclaim Him
A God who worketh
And who heareth prayer

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Be all at rest
So shalt thou be an answer
To those who question
Who is God and where
For God is rest
And where He dwells
Is stillness
And they who dwell
In Him that rest shall share
